import React, { setState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios' import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom" function Login() { const history = useHistory() const [username,getusername] = setState(' '); const [password,getpassword] = setState(' '); function handlesubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); const data = { username: username, password: password } axios.post('http://localhost:18598/api/Login', data) .then(res => { localStorage.setItem('token', res.data) history.push("/Dashboard") }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) console.log(data) } return (
